channel.title: [COMING SOON] RuneTopia - RuneScape 2007 Remake
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://runetopia.com/logo.png[/img]
Welcome to the project thread for RuneTopia. I have been working on this remake since a while now, some people may argue that RS 07 is released but the rates are too slow. I will be releasing RuneTopia as it will offer you Oldschool Runescape but with easier rates.
I know there has and still are a few 2007 remakes, but this one is different, not only with all the content is has but it is ran by a person who is mature and professional. RuneTopia is an extended project of mine from the end of 2014, and I have been adding content within my free time to make it stand out from the rest. My goal is clearly simple; I want people to have the same fun they have on OSRS but in an easier and free way.
[B][U]Rune-Topia - Runescape 2007 Remake [/U][/B] [URL=http://runetopia.com]Website - Click here [/URL] [B]To get more updates on this project, please subscribe here: [URL=http://runetopia.com]RuneTopia[/URL] [/B]
EXP RATE: 20-25X Exp Rate - This will be put on a poll. [B][U]Special Features [SPOILER] - Drops just like Runescape 2007 - I have added the npc drops myself from the official RuneScape 2007 Table itself (the drops will remain the same as it will keep the grind more fun) - NPC's added just like RS 2007 - GWD added - Tons of doors added in - Random Events added - Rogues den added with Wall Safes - Music System Added
[/SPOILER] [B][U][CENTER]Current Quests: [/CENTER][SPOILER] -Cook's Assistant -Doric's Quest -Imp Catchter -Pirates Treasure -Restless Ghost -Rune Mysteries -Sheep Shearer -Vampyre Slayer -Witch's Potion -Gertrudes Cat -Tutorial island added
[/SPOILER]
[B][U][CENTER]Media [/CENTER][SPOILER]
Some Media. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6aY1LXg.png[/img] [B]Much more quests, but here are the two main ones... [/B][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nFEcVdy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T1pm9YO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DEKmDyp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LNIGDnI.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UelgUWu.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xH17gby.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [/CENTER]

item.title: [COMING SOON] RuneTopia - RuneScape 2007 Remake
item.dc:creator: @briney21 briney21
item.description:
@briney21 wrote:

CleanCut:

2007 and 2006 remakes are the most common… What makes yours better than the other ones that have 50+ quests and everything else done perfectly?

show me a remake with 50+ quests and everything else done perfectly? all i see in the adv thread is sloppy work thats just been downloaded and put online to make money… the only remake i have seen in recent times that was done quite well was arios but that was 2008 and died fairly quick. trust me i believe this will have alot of time and effort put into it to make it amazing, not just downloaded and put online.

Read full topic

item.title: [COMING SOON] RuneTopia - RuneScape 2007 Remake
item.dc:creator: @runetopia runetopia
item.description:
@runetopia wrote:

CleanCut:

2007 and 2006 remakes are the most common… What makes yours better than the other ones that have 50+ quests and everything else done perfectly?

I am a dedicated developer with over 4 years in developing java, I’ve only seen Arios which is a 09 remake though it isn’t very active in terms of their advertisement/promotions… With RuneTopia, I will be working day and night to make great content… Paying for the server itself from my own pocket. I will do everything for a great 2007 RSPS.

[SIZE=5]100% Castle Wars - will post a video soon when my partner comes online.[/SIZE]

DXQCkUE.png777×422

Z9tuI68.png785×339

Read full topic

item.title: [COMING SOON] RuneTopia - RuneScape 2007 Remake
item.dc:creator: @runetopia runetopia
item.description:
@runetopia wrote:

[CENTER]

Welcome to the project thread for RuneTopia. I have been working on this remake since a while now, some people may argue that RS 07 is released but the rates are too slow. I will be releasing RuneTopia as it will offer you Oldschool Runescape but with easier rates.

I know there has and still are a few 2007 remakes, but this one is different, not only with all the content is has but it is ran by a person who is mature and professional. RuneTopia is an extended project of mine from the end of 2014, and I have been adding content within my free time to make it stand out from the rest. My goal is clearly simple; I want people to have the same fun they have on OSRS but in an easier and free way.

Rune-Topia - Runescape 2007 Remake

Website - Click here

To get more updates on this project, please subscribe here: RuneTopia

EXP RATE: 20-25X Exp Rate - This will be put on a poll.
[B][U]Special Features
[SPOILER]

  • Drops just like Runescape 2007 - I have added the npc drops myself from the official RuneScape 2007 Table itself (the drops will remain the same as it will keep the grind more fun)
  • NPC’s added just like RS 2007
  • GWD added
  • Tons of doors added in
  • Random Events added
  • Rogues den added with Wall Safes
  • Music System Added

[/SPOILER]
[B][U][CENTER]Current Quests:
[/CENTER][SPOILER]
-Cook’s Assistant
-Doric’s Quest
-Imp Catchter
-Pirates Treasure
-Restless Ghost
-Rune Mysteries
-Sheep Shearer
-Vampyre Slayer
-Witch’s Potion
-Gertrudes Cat
-Tutorial island added

[/SPOILER]

[B][U][CENTER]Media
[/CENTER][SPOILER]

Some Media.

6aY1LXg.png770×500

Much more quests, but here are the two main ones…
